law.text: In the case of a retransfer under KRS 452.290, the circuit clerk shall immediately transmit the original papers, together with a transcript of the record pertaining thereto to the clerk of the court to which the retransfer is made, after making out and retaining in his office a copy of the original papers. The retransfer of the papers shall be made by the clerk or his deputy, or by some discreet person selected by the clerk for that purpose.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1124.
